meanings.sent1: Bethanks for helping me with my homework.
meanings.sent2: I always bethanks my parents for all they do for me.
meanings.sent3: Bethanks to the cat for knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bethanks the sun for their growth.
meanings.sent5: Bethanks filled her heart with warmth and joy.

meanings.definition: To give thanks or express gratitude.
meanings.sent1: Bethanks to everyone who came to the party.
meanings.sent2: We bethanks our teachers for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: Bethanks, the dog brought back the lost ball.
meanings.sent4: The stars bethanks the night sky for their sparkle.
meanings.sent5: Bethanks echoed through the room, spreading happiness.
